QuestData.Title: Shattering the Veil
QuestData.Description: <Gordawg breaks off a piece of ebon rock from his back.>$B$BYou are granted a piece of the fury of the earth. Take the boulder of Gordawg and hurl it at the poison rock. Shatter their shells to discover the truth. Destroy the minions of the usurper and return to Gordawg with the name.$B$BYou find the shattered elements at the edge of the world. Southwest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gordawg at the Throne of the Elements in Nagrand has asked that you slay 30 Minions of Gurok.
